sections.title: Hell Knight Signifer (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Hell Knight Signifer class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Hell Knight Signifer)
sections.description: Grants proficiency with heavy armor and one favored weapon from the Hell Knight's chosen order.

sections.title: Aura of Law ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Hell Knight Signifer)
sections.description: The signifer's aura of law has a power equal to his total character level for detect law purposes.

sections.title: Catechesis ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Hell Knight Signifer)
sections.description: With Warrior Priest feat, signifer levels stack with divine spellcasting classes for domain powers and grants Alignment Channel (chaos) as a bonus feat.

sections.title: Order (Hell Knight Signifer)
sections.description: The signifer chooses a Hell Knight order to join, each with specific favored weapons.

sections.title: Signifer Mask (Su) (Hell Knight Signifer)
sections.description: Provides a magical mask that grants +2 competence bonus on Sense Motive checks and saves against visual effects, can be converted into an arcane bonded object.

sections.title: Arcane Armor Expertise (Hell Knight Signifer)
sections.description: Grants Arcane Armor Mastery as a bonus feat if the signifer has Arcane Armor Training, and improves the feat's action economy at higher levels.

sections.title: Signifer Armor Training (Hell Knight Signifer)
sections.description: Reduces armor check penalty and arcane spell failure while wearing armor, with additional benefits at higher levels including speed reduction offset.

sections.title: Assiduous Gaze (Hell Knight Signifer)
sections.description: Grants special gaze abilities that can analyze creatures, objects, or areas for magical properties, alignment, or hidden features.

sections.title: Discern Lies (Sp) (Hell Knight Signifer)
sections.description: Allows use of discern lies as a spell-like ability multiple times per day based on Charisma modifier.

sections.title: Infernal Resilience ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Hell Knight Signifer)
sections.description: Grants damage reduction 5/chaotic and immunity to poison.

sections.title: Diabolic Harbinger (Su) (Hell Knight Signifer)
sections.description: While wearing the signifer mask, grants telepathy, perfect darkvision, immunity to blindness/dazzling, and bonuses when interacting with lawful creatures.
